name: humaners
description: Multi-Sensory AI-Powered Communication & Survival System - Real-time emotion recognition through facial expressions, gestures, and audio

scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-html: html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js index.html -o index.min.html && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js launcher.html -o launcher.min.html
scripts.minify-js: terser script.js -o script.min.js --compress --mangle && terser frontend.js -o frontend.min.js --compress --mangle

author: AsleshSura
